quiz.question: Which of the following is a key component of the Android security model?
quiz.hint: It isolates apps from each other to prevent unauthorized data access.

quiz.question: What does OWASP MASVS stand for in mobile security?
options: Open Web Application Security Project Mobile Application Security Verification Standard
Online Web Application Security Project Mobile Application Security Verification Standard
Open Web Application Security Project Mobile Application Security Vulnerability Standard
Open Web Application Security Project Mobile Application Secure Verification Standard
quiz.hint: OWASP MASVS provides a standard for mobile app security verification.

quiz.question: Which of the following is a common vulnerability in mobile applications according to OWASP?
quiz.hint: This vulnerability involves improper handling of sensitive data on devices.

quiz.question: What is a primary purpose of Mobile Device Management (MDM)?
options: To secure and manage mobile devices
quiz.hint: MDM focuses on overseeing and securing devices used within an enterprise.

quiz.question: In secure mobile app development, what practice helps protect sensitive data?
quiz.hint: This security measure requires more than one method of verification.
